name: Reuben Casserole
author: JAMON0126
summary: Layers of sauerkraut, corned beef, Swiss cheese, rye bread crumbs, and Russian-style salad dressing make up this casserole version of the deli sandwich .
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can sauerkraut, drained and rinsed
1 pound deli sliced corned beef, cut into strips
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spread bread cubes in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish
Spread sauerkraut evenly over the bread cubes, then layer beef strips over sauerkraut
Spray aluminum foil with cooking spray and use to cover baking dish, sprayed side down
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Remove cover, sprinkle with cheese and bake uncovered for another 10 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly
